title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 341.12 - Referral to authorized physician
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 341.12 - Referral to authorized physician

State Regulations

When the injury or condition is one without the limits
prescribed by the Education Law for podiatry care and treatment, or the
injuries or condition involved affect other parts of the body in addition to
the foot, the podiatrist must so advise the injured employee and instruct him
or her to consult an authorized physician, of said patient's choice, for
appropriate care and treatment. In such event the physician shall have overall
supervision of the patient's care. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
341.12

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
